answers.answer: Not working yet, but they are working on it!  Sorry for the inconvenience!
No problem , with everything else going on it just drove me mad.
Yes, none of my trackers wanted to work, I had to run the tutorial in order to put in my info! It was indeed frustrating >.>

Well .. good news .. they should be up and running within a few hours.  MedHelp constantly improves the site and listens to the needs of their members.Once this is fixed, you should be able to print out most of the trackers to share with your doctor, a friend, a counselor or to share with a friend.Thanks for your patience while this is being fixed.  :)

question: Is there anyone elses trackers not working? its driving me mad that i cant put my weight loss in, or my diabetes results, i contacted them first thing this morning but its still not working
title: trackers
